module.title: Info: Dashboard
module.description:
Overview with panels collected from other modules.
Calls hook Dashboard::registerPanels.
module.log: Use database to store user dashboards.
Extract style definitions to CSS file.
Add switch and limits for user boards.
Preselect default panels on new user dashboard.
Add hooks to list and remove user related entities.
Extract AJAX actions to own controller class.
Support dashboard panels on AJAX controllers
module.author: Christian Würker
module.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>dashboards`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>dashboards` ( `dashboardId` int(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userId` int(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `isCurrent` tinyint(1) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0', `title` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `description` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `panels` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `modifiedAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`dashboardId`), KEY `userId` (`userId`), KEY `isCurrent` (`isCurrent`), KEY `title` (`title`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>dashboards`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>dashboards` ( `dashboardId` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userId` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `isCurrent` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL, `title` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `description` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NULL, `panels` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned NOT NULL, `modifiedAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`dashboardId`), KEY `userId` (`userId`), KEY `isCurrent` (`isCurrent`), KEY `title` (`title`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>dashboards` CHANGE `isCurrent` `isCurrent` TINYINT(1) UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT '0';
